header.title: wxFileDirPickerEvent

description.p: This event class is used for the events generated by wxFilePickerCtrl and by wxDirPickerCtrl.
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxCommandEvent wxEvent

section.title: Events
section.p: Use wxEvtHandler:connect/3 with wxFileDirPickerEventType to subscribe to events of this type.

func.fsummary: Retrieve the absolute path of the file/directory the user has just selected.
